Honestly, {{champion:91}}  has a very easy fix. Just replace the  99% slow with a snare of the same duration. It's healthier than the old silence since it doesn't stop all ability use, but it keeps them still better than the slow does since they can't dash or flash out of it. {{champion:22}}  Ashe literally cant escape supports like {{champion:53}} or {{champion:412}} . for example i jumped on a lucian as a jax before and he kited the shitt out of me. I was playing some ashe the other day, and a jax jumps on me. Does ashe have a dash? no. Does she have any real skill shots? no.  I only had 2 options, to keep autoing while he had his e up and get stuned, or option 2, to run and still get jumped on and stunned. I died pretty fast, but keep in mind this jax was 0-9. and i was 5-2, with enough farm for the time of the match. 
      
I'm not saying jax is op, but he didnt need his recent late game buffs. Any adc with a dash isn't weak to jax. If jax q's first they dash away before the stun hits. If he saves his e they will dash away anyways. IMO. ashe just needs a rework bcause she only fits into a team comp that can peel for her. I just feel like ashe needs MS buffs if they wont give her a dash. 

edit: she doesent scale well at all either.

The Passive cooldown reducer on W is weak late game. Too much effort is needed to do simple thing that would other
